thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 2 of 47
thread.title: Darren Cooper

author: Darren Cooper
title: Darren Cooper
text:
I have been coming here for service for many years, and honestly the service team are second to none. I had the opportunity recently to look at purchasing a new vehicle for my business and trading the old vehicle. Motorama made the transition smooth and simple, with easy finance options available, and a professional courteous team.
Definitely highly recommend Motorama Holden.
